creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: unsigned; silhouette of two-sailed junk, without outlines; dinghy in tow without rope
marks: Top edge: #2A showing color block to print on #1 |
title: A Junk, printing order no. 2A
